name: delang-storage-function
description: Secure file storage Cloud Functions for DeLangZeta

scripts.deploy:upload: gcloud functions deploy storage-upload --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point uploadHandler
scripts.deploy:download: gcloud functions deploy storage-download --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point downloadHandler
scripts.deploy:metadata: gcloud functions deploy storage-metadata --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point metadataHandler
scripts.deploy:enhanced-access: gcloud functions deploy storage-enhanced-access --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point enhancedAccessHandler
scripts.deploy:create-share: gcloud functions deploy storage-create-share --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point createShareLinkHandler
scripts.deploy:share-access: gcloud functions deploy storage-share-access --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point shareAccessHandler --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:manage-sharing: gcloud functions deploy storage-manage-sharing --runtime nodejs18 --trigger http --entry-point manageSharingHandler
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:upload && npm run deploy:download && npm run deploy:metadata && npm run deploy:enhanced-access && npm run deploy:create-share && npm run deploy:share-access && npm run deploy:manage-sharing
